title: Ground News - Passenger shot in back while passing site of gunfire, Hammond cops say
text:
Summary by Ground News Gary Police Department: MOTOR VEHICLE THEFT; RESISTING - INTERFERING WITH LAW ENFORCEMENT DEF. USES A VEHicle. Lake County Sheriff's Department: INTIMIDATION, RESISTing - OBSTRUCTION OF TRAFFIC; BATTERY - AGGRAVATED - W/INJURY.
